attributes.action: ensure doctors have a better understanding and for there to be better medical intervention for people with anorexia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the way this condition is dealt with currently by the medical proffession  i feel is not satisfactory this is from my own personal experience currently and also fron the many many things that have been reported ove a period of time.It should not under any circumstances be left until a patient is on deaths door before intervention is taken place-this is why so many people are dying from this cruel disease when things if there was more understanding and more facilities could be done earlier.
